functions.label: abs
functions.documentation: Returns the absolute value of a number

functions.label: array_all
functions.documentation: Checks if all array values pass a callback test (new in PHP 8.4, but planning ahead)

functions.label: array_chunk
functions.documentation: Splits an array into chunks

functions.label: array_column
functions.documentation: Returns the values from a single column in the input array

functions.label: array_combine
functions.documentation: Creates an array by using one array for keys and another for its values

functions.label: array_count_values
functions.documentation: Counts all the values of an array

functions.label: array_diff
functions.documentation: Computes the difference of arrays

functions.label: array_diff_assoc
functions.documentation: Computes the difference of arrays with additional index check

functions.label: array_diff_key
functions.documentation: Computes the difference of arrays using keys for comparison

functions.label: array_fill
functions.documentation: Fills an array with values

functions.label: array_fill_keys
functions.documentation: Fills an array with values, specifying keys

functions.label: array_filter
functions.documentation: Filters elements of an array using a callback function

functions.label: array_flip
functions.documentation: Exchanges all keys with their associated values in an array

functions.label: array_intersect
functions.documentation: Computes the intersection of arrays

functions.label: array_intersect_key
functions.documentation: Computes the intersection of arrays using keys for comparison

functions.label: array_is_list
functions.documentation: Checks whether a given array is a list (new in PHP 8.1)

functions.label: array_key_exists
functions.documentation: Checks if the given key or index exists in the array

functions.label: array_keys
functions.documentation: Returns all the keys or a subset of the keys of an array
functions.detail: array array_keys(array $array, mixed $search_value = null, bool $strict = false)

functions.label: array_map
functions.documentation: Applies a callback function to the elements of arrays

functions.label: array_merge
functions.documentation: Merges one or more arrays

functions.label: array_merge_recursive
functions.documentation: Merges two or more arrays recursively

functions.label: array_pad
functions.documentation: Pads array to the specified length with a value

functions.label: array_pop
functions.documentation: Pops the element off the end of array

functions.label: array_push
functions.documentation: Pushes one or more elements onto the end of array

functions.label: array_rand
functions.documentation: Picks one or more random keys out of an array

functions.label: array_reduce
functions.documentation: Iteratively reduces the array to a single value using a callback function

functions.label: array_replace
functions.documentation: Replaces elements from passed arrays into the first array

functions.label: array_reverse
functions.documentation: Returns an array with elements in reverse order

functions.label: array_search
functions.documentation: Searches the array for a given value and returns the first corresponding key if successful

functions.label: array_shift
functions.documentation: Shifts an element off the beginning of array

functions.label: array_slice
functions.documentation: Extracts a slice of the array
functions.detail: array array_slice(array $array, int $offset, ?int $length = null, bool $preserve_keys = false)

functions.label: array_splice
functions.documentation: Removes a portion of the array and replaces it with something else

functions.label: array_sum
functions.documentation: Calculates the sum of values in an array

functions.label: array_unique
functions.documentation: Removes duplicate values from an array

functions.label: array_unshift
functions.documentation: Prepends one or more elements to the beginning of an array

functions.label: array_values
functions.documentation: Returns all the values of an array

functions.label: array_walk
functions.documentation: Applies a user function to every member of an array

functions.label: arsort
functions.documentation: Sorts an array in descending order and maintains index association

functions.label: asort
functions.documentation: Sorts an array in ascending order and maintains index association

functions.label: base64_decode
functions.documentation: Decodes data encoded with MIME base64

functions.label: base64_encode
functions.documentation: Encodes data with MIME base64

functions.label: basename
functions.documentation: Returns trailing name component of path

functions.label: bin2hex
functions.documentation: Converts binary data into hexadecimal representation

functions.label: boolval
functions.documentation: Gets the boolean value of a variable

functions.label: ceil
functions.documentation: Rounds a number up to the next highest integer

functions.label: class_exists
functions.documentation: Checks if the class has been defined

functions.label: compact
functions.documentation: Creates array containing variables and their values

functions.label: count
functions.documentation: Counts all elements in an array or countable object

functions.label: curl_close
functions.documentation: Closes a cURL session

functions.label: curl_exec
functions.documentation: Performs a cURL session

functions.label: curl_init
functions.documentation: Initializes a cURL session

functions.label: curl_setopt
functions.documentation: Sets an option for a cURL transfer

functions.label: date
functions.documentation: Formats a Unix timestamp

functions.label: defined
functions.documentation: Checks whether a given named constant exists

functions.label: dirname
functions.documentation: Returns a parent directory's path

functions.label: empty
functions.documentation: Determines whether a variable is empty

functions.label: enum_exists
functions.documentation: Checks if the enum has been defined (new in PHP 8.1)

functions.label: explode
functions.documentation: Splits a string by a string delimiter

functions.label: fclose
functions.documentation: Closes an open file pointer

functions.label: fdatasync
functions.documentation: Synchronizes data (but not meta-data) to the file (new in PHP 8.1)

functions.documentation: Divides two numbers according to IEEE 754

functions.documentation: Tests for end-of-file on a file pointer

functions.documentation: Writes data to a file

functions.documentation: Filters a variable with a specified filter

functions.documentation: Synchronizes changes to the file (including meta-data) (new in PHP 8.1)

functions.label: fwrite
functions.documentation: Binary-safe file write

functions.label: get_class
functions.documentation: Returns the name of the class of an object

functions.documentation: Gets the type name of a variable in a way that is suitable for debugging

functions.label: get_resource_id

functions.documentation: Gets the current working directory

functions.label: gettype
functions.documentation: Gets the type of a variable

functions.documentation: Finds pathnames matching a pattern

functions.documentation: Generates a hash value (message digest)

functions.label: hash_equals
functions.documentation: Timing attack safe string comparison

functions.label: header
functions.documentation: Sends a raw HTTP header

functions.documentation: Checks if a value exists in an array

functions.documentation: Sets the value of a configuration option

functions.label: intval
functions.documentation: Gets the integer value of a variable

functions.documentation: Finds whether a variable is an array

functions.label: is_bool
functions.documentation: Finds out whether a variable is a boolean

functions.documentation: Tells whether the filename is a directory

functions.documentation: Tells whether the filename is a regular file

functions.documentation: Finds whether the type of a variable is float

functions.documentation: Finds whether the type of a variable is integer

functions.documentation: Finds whether a variable is null

functions.documentation: Finds whether a variable is a number or a numeric string

functions.documentation: Finds whether a variable is an object

functions.documentation: Finds whether the type of a variable is string

functions.documentation: Determines if a variable is declared and is different than null

functions.documentation: Decodes a JSON string

functions.documentation: Returns the JSON representation of a value

functions.documentation: Returns the last error occurred

functions.documentation: Gets string length

functions.documentation: Gets part of string

functions.documentation: Calculates the md5 hash of a string

functions.documentation: Returns the amount of memory allocated to PHP

functions.documentation: Checks if the class method exists

functions.documentation: Finds lowest value

functions.documentation: Parses a URL and returns its components
